keyword: how many calories is in a toast
title: How Many Calories Are in a Toast?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a toast, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per slice with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Toast?
assumptions: Standard slice of white bread (about 28 g), toasted dry, no butter, spreads, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, brand, slice thickness, and toasting method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of plain toasted white bread has about 75 kcal and 14 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a toast with butter?
faqs.a: About 111 kcal for one slice with 1 tsp butter added to plain toast.

faqs.q: Does toasting bread change the calories?
faqs.a: No, toasting doesn't add or remove calories; it's the same as untoasted bread.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a slice of toast?
faqs.a: Around 14 g carbs per slice of white toast, with 0.7 g fiber.

faqs.q: How many calories in whole grain toast?
faqs.a: Slightly more, about 80 kcal per slice, with higher fiber.
Yes, plain toast has just 1 g fat per slice, mostly unsaturated.
